data.title: Forbes
data.meta_description: Forbes is a global media company, focusing on business, investing, technology, entrepreneurship, leadership, and lifestyle.
data.text:
Daily Cover Story

It’s been more than eight years since content farms overseas started “American” fake news pages on Facebook. Their business, now fueled by AI, is still going strong.

Billionaire Telegram CEO Pavel Durov Arrested In France: Here’s What We Know

Pavel Durov was reportedly arrested in relation to an investigation into whether Telegram is used for criminal activity.
